text: Huna alaha ne tuhada bhara haula kara dita hai. Ate usa ne jana li'a ki tuhade vico kujha kamazora hana. Isa la'i tuhade vicom jekara sau vi atala nisace vale honage tam uha alaha de hukama nala do sau upara bhari jita prapata karanage jekara hazara honage tam do hazara te bharu rahinage ate alaha drira bharosa rakhana vali'am de nala hai
